markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Floating Femur](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2028)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Floating femurs can deliver a powerful blow. They make handy weapons for those who manage to grab hold of them. 

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/AnimatedBones_FloatingFemur.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Floating Femur](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2028)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +3; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +1

**Con** +1

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 7

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), fatigued, [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 2, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 2, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 2, piercing 2, slashing 2

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
femur head +8 ([fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 bludgeoning

**Gotcha!**   A floating femur freezes up if [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20). For 1 minute after the femur becomes grabbed or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) by a creature, the femur can't act, and the creature holding it can use it as a _+1 [club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2)_ with the [fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178) trait. After that time, the floating femur can act and is generally quite aggressive toward whomever used it as a weapon.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-317" />
name: Floating Femur

</summary>

text: Floating Femur Floating femurs can deliver a powerful blow. They make handy weapons for those who manage to grab hold of them. Recall Knowledge - Construct (Arcana, Crafting): DC 15 Unspecific Lore : DC 13 Specific Lore : DC 10 Floating Femur Source Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast pg. 82 Perception +3; darkvision Languages Skills Athletics +6, Stealth +6 Str +1 Dex +1 Con +1 Int -5 Wis +0 Cha -5 --- AC 14 Fort +4 Ref +6 Will +3 HP 7 Immunities death effects, disease, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious Resistances cold 2, electricity 2, fire 2, piercing 2, slashing 2 --- Speed fly 25 feet Melee Single Action femur head +8 (fatal d10), Damage 1d4+1 bludgeoning Gotcha! A floating femur freezes up if grabbed. For 1 minute after the femur becomes grabbed or restrained by a creature, the femur can't act, and the creature holding it can use it as a +1 club with the fatal d10 trait. After that time, the floating femur can act and is generally quite aggressive toward whomever used it as a weapon.
